name: ai-blog-website
description: AI-powered blog website with MERN stack

scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run server" "wait-on http://localhost:8000/api/health && npm run client"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: AI Blog Developer
